messages.text: Title: fix: ethers/viem issue in mind network plugin
Title: feat: Add arbitrage plugin with example character
messages.message: This PR adds a new plugin enabling cryptocurrency arbitrage trading across DEXs. Features include real-time market monitoring, automated opportunity detection, Flashbots integration, and support for Uniswap V2-compatible DEX pairs.

messages.text: fix: client-twitter homeTimeline name parse bug
messages.message: Fixed a bug where the API returned 'undefined' for names, by retrieving it from .core.
